channel.title: Error. help appreciated
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 2 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:118) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:31)
i get this, i added a shop with a skill cape in it? i added a skillcape into an esisting shop and it didnt come up witht his it compiles fine its just got an error when i run the server help please?
